with a penchant for stealing starships

description: isn't officially dead
is definitely not a hugging type
has an unhealthy obsession with frogs
thinks they have a divine right to the throne of a lost civilization
is wanted in three systems for crimes they didn't commit
has met a god and thinks it was a dream
is on the run from their murderous aunt
had an unfortunate incident with the fae and now doesn't trust brunch
is working on a magnum opus about sunflowers
won a pie eating contest that was judged by royalty
doesn't believe that magic exists, and is sure that magic users are charlatans
is in search of the perfect flavor
lost a family hierloom weapon and is on a quest to recover it before they finds out
distrusts the color green
thinks that their death will come from a hooded figure with inkstained hands
enjoys talking to strangers in a new settlement
has been unintentionally caught in the middle of a blood feud between two merchant familes
keeps making social faux pas at every party they go to
isn't sure if they have a twin, or if they have forgotten meeting that many people
won a drinking contest at a famous establishment, and is terrified that someone will find out they cheated
has a penchant for bursting into dance routines at inappropriate moments
is extremely proud of the one time they taught a sailor a new curse word
really wants to start a family one day
fervently believes they are destined for greatness
hates spending credits
is saving up to propose to their childhood sweetheart
challenges anyone who questions them to a philosophical debate on the nature of self
doesn't have any sense of direction
always seems to have a tawdry novel close to hand
believes in helping others, regardless of the cost to themselves
is fleeing a marriage arranged to gain their family more influence
can't remember why they started exploring, but is sure that it was an important reason
gets an uneasy feeling anytime they go underground
is trying to prove their ability as an adventurer to their family by finding a mythical gemstone
keeps having dreams of a portal opening in a wall, full of light and one massive eye
is pretty sure they can understand what plants are saying
is morally opposed to shedding blood
enjoys taunting guards in any settlement they visit, though is proud of never having been thrown in jail for it
keeps their weapons and armor obsessively clean
gives a completely different story about how they got their obvious scar every time they're asked
has a deep appreciation of historical modes of transport
distrusts computers and isn't sure why
really enjoys the sound of laser fire
hopes to try a loaf of perfect bread someday
